summary: This appears to be an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a draft co-conspirator memo. The sender indicates they are waiting for FBI interview notes to provide more detail and attaches a draft of the memo.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who indicates they jointly drafted a co-conspirator memo and are waiting for FBI interview notes to provide more detail.

events.title: Co-conspirator memo draft communication
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email regarding a draft co-conspirator memo, indicating difficulty providing more detail while waiting for FBI interview notes.

keyFacts: A draft co-conspirator memo was being prepared by prosecutors as of August 14, 2019.
The prosecutors were waiting for FBI interview notes to provide more detail in the memo.
The communication indicates ongoing investigative and prosecutorial work related to the Epstein case at that time.
